subject: Running
lead_paragraph: The former Olympic marathon champion Joan Benoit Samuelson broke the United States women’s indoor 3,000-meter record for runners 50 and older. Samuelson, 51, clocked 10 minutes 22.69 seconds at the USA Masters Indoor Track & Field Championships in Landover, Md., lowering the mark of 10:23.84. record.
